t = int(input())

for _ in range(t):
    [n, x] = [int(v) for v in input().split()]
    print(2 * x)

n = int(input())
for i in range(n):
    x, y = map(int, input().split())
    print(2 * y)

t = int(input())
for _ in range(t):
    _, n = list(map(int, input().split()))
    print(2 * n)

ii = lambda: int(input())
mi = lambda: list(map(int, input().split()))
li = lambda: list(mi())

for _ in range(ii()):
    x, n = mi()
    print(n * 2)

t = int(input())
for i in range(t):
    n, x = map(int, input().split())
    print(x * 2)

n=int(input())
for i in range(n):
    x,y=list(map(int,input().split()))
    print(y*2)

import sys

T = int(sys.stdin.readline().strip())
for t in range(0, T):
    n, x = list(map(int, sys.stdin.readline().strip().split()))
    print(2 * x)

T = int(input())
for i in range(T):
    n, k = list(map(int, input().split()))
    print(2 * k)
